title: Dear Riot,
body:
** I would really like to know the punishments for the players i report, please.**

-


Some of their behavior is absolutely ridiculous.  I just had my adc rage quit because jungler smited away a blue buff from them... at around 25 minutes into the game. We were winning by a large margin. Then we lost.

If i report someone, it's because what they did hurts the community and the game.

Every report I make is very important to me. 

I would really like to know what was done.

-signed
A Very Frustrated Poro

replies.body: It is not your right to know someone else's punishment history.
I would think that you should know that a certain report was successful in there being a case, but not the outcome of said case. Because it let's you know that particular report meant something.

Well it is pretty fucking obivious.

if someone gets a 14 day, check their op.gg.

no one really cares about chat bans.

Honestly, it probably *should* be more visible.

It would let people see that action is being taken (riot does nothing trolls never get punished QQ...)

And it would help people understand what is and is not acceptable behavior, and cut down on threats/false reports.
